[@andrestaltz](@QlCTpvY7p9ty2yOFrv1WU1AE88aoQc4Y7wYal7PFc+w=.ed25519) 

I should have tried that! That 14k number was from a few days ago when I hadn't even created `~/.ssb/config` yet, and I didn't think to do any testing with 999 hops. I reduced my hops down to 2 and recreated my database this morning, but I can pop it back up to 999 again this weekend and test it out.
